main event: A sighting occurred on 25 Aug 52 in Schenectady, New York, involving an unidentified object observed above tree tops.
interesting points: The observer reported seeing an object that flashed a white trail and made no sound., The object rose, paused, and then disappeared., The sighting lasted just a few seconds., The observer had six months of experience with the Ground Observer Corps., The exact shape and size of the object were unknown.
witness description: Ground Observer Corps observer with six months of experience
